views.markdown:
Compatible (tested) with iOS 8 to 12.

SkinnySettings gives you minimal, useful and smooth options to make better and more functional your Settings Application adding these nice Features:

- No Separators.

- No Cell Icons.

- No Cell Titles.

- No Search Bar.

- Make Grey the Background of the Settings.

- Make Silver with a White Shadow the Bar of the Navigation.

- Make the Settings in FullScreen Mode.

- Hide the Third Applications Section.

- Hide the Badge on the Software Update Section (inside App Badge).

- Disable the Tap on the Software Update Section.

- Disable the Searching on the Software Update Section.

The options are enabled (visible) inside the Applications/Features of the Settings too.

No Respring Needed for enabling and disabling the Tweak.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!

Configure options from Settings.

Credits are on Preferences Panel.

Version 1.3.2 - Added the option to Enable Transparent Background. - Cleanup the Makefiles. Version 1.3.0
- Added the option to Make Round the Settings Tables (included roundPrefs on My Repository).
Version 1.2.9
- Compatible with iOS 12.
- Added the option to View the IP Address from the Settings (Thanks bro @MTAC8).
Version 1.2.8
- Added the option to Hide the Badged Table Cell.
- Added the option to Hide the Badge on iCloud Features (thanks patch by burntscarr).
- Added the option to Make Oval the Badged Table Cell.
-Improvements.
Version 1.2.7
- Added the option to Enable the Dark Mode also for the KeyBoard of the Settings.


Version 1.2.6
- Added the option to Enable the Dark Mode for the Settings (Integration of my Tweak DarkSettings available on my Repository).

!(Happy New Year)!
Version 1.2.4
- Added the option to Extend the Large Navigation Titles on iOS 11 inside the Settings.
Version 1.2.3
- Hopefully Last Issues Fixes.
- General Improvements.


Version 1.2.2
- Hopefully Fixed the Crashes on iOS 9 for some Users (thanks so much my Friend @karimouni24 for testing Stuff).
Version 1.2.1
- Added the option to Hide the Apple Account Cell (Requested on Twitter).


Version 1.2.0
-Now you can Custom Select also the Colors of your Settings Parent Text.
- Fixed libcolorpicker issue that caused the Settings App crashing on iOS 11.
- Code Changes, Improvements.


Version 1.1.9
- Added some Colors :-) (libcolorpicker Dependency).

-Now you can Custom Select the Colors of your Settings Background.
- Now you can Custom Select the Colors of your Settings Foreground.
- Now you can Custom Select the Colors of your Settings Separators.

‪(Coming Soon Next: Custom Parent Text Colors)‬.

(Thanks to thazsar).
Version 1.1.8
- Added the option to Enable VoLTE for All Carriers (tip by DakutaSuta777).
Version 1.1.7
- Added the option to Hide the SOS Menu (tip by @albyvar25).
- Improved the Enable Full Screen View option for iOS 11 and iPhone X.
Version 1.1.6
- Added the option to Disable the Bluetooth Unpairing of the Device (tip by rshelver).
Version 1.1.5
- Added Full iOS 11 Compatibility.
- Added the option to Remove the Large Navigation Titles on iOS 11.
- Fixes in the Preferences Labels Panel.
- Changes.
Version 1.1.4
- Added the option to Hide the Top Separators of the Settings.
- Added the option to Hide the Bottom Separators of the Settings.
- Fixes in the Preferences Labels Panel.
Version 1.1.3
- Added the option to Fade the Settings Navigation Bar when Scrolling.
- Optimizations.


Version 1.1.2
- Added the option to Disable the Settings Switches Touch Feedback.
- Added the Label to Check Other Tweaks by Me on BigBoss Repo.


Version 1.1.1
- Added the option to Fade the Settings StatusBar.
Happy New Year to All of You! :-)
Version 1.1
- Added the option to Make Settings bouncing (incorporation of DrunkSettings available on my Repo).
Version 1.0.9
- Added the option to Hide Space between the List (tips by panjoel08 and Olivier Crespo).
Version 1.0.8
- Added the option to Hide the Top Navigation Labels.


Version 1.0.7
- Added the option to Hide the Search Bar Border Grey Background.
- Added the option to Hide the Blur on Navigation Bar.
- Added the option to Make Graphite White Shadow the Color of Navigation Bar.
Version 1.0.6
- Added the option to Hide the Back Text Buttons (tip by panjoel08).


Version 1.0.5
- Added the option to Make Black the Tap on Cells Settings and Relative Black Fade Effect when going Back (tip by panjoel08).
- Now you can Donate Me (thanks) with the New Label in Preferences Panel.

Version 1.0.4

Version 1.0.3
- Added the option to accept Any Restrictions Passcode in case of Lapse of Memory (thanks windexi for the tip).
